languages.text: "Д-да? Ну раз так... Будьте осторожны, впереди ждет засада Кошмаров! И вот еще что — я буду ждать неподалеку, вдруг помощь понадобится какая. Только молю, поторопитесь, посланни{mf|к|ца} небес! Альбриса же могут убить..."

traits.locale_text: "Д-да? Ну раз так... Будьте осторожны, впереди ждет засада Кошмаров! И вот еще что — я буду ждать неподалеку, вдруг помощь понадобится какая. Только молю, поторопитесь, посланни{mf|к|ца} небес! Альбриса же могут убить..."

languages.text: "R-really? If you say so... Be careful, the Nightmares will be lying in wait up ahead! And I will be waiting for you nearby, in case you need any help. But, I beg you, please hurry, Heavenly Envoy! They could be killing Albris as we speak..."
languages.original_text: "Д-да? Ну раз так... Будьте осторожны, впереди ждет засада Кошмаров! И вот еще что — я буду ждать неподалеку, вдруг помощь понадобится какая. Только молю, поторопитесь, посланни{mf|к|ца} небес! Альбриса же могут убить..."

traits.locale_text: "R-really? If you say so... Be careful, the Nightmares will be lying in wait up ahead! And I will be waiting for you nearby, in case you need any help. But, I beg you, please hurry, Heavenly Envoy! They could be killing Albris as we speak..."
"Really? If you say so... There, I will be waiting for you at the entrance or you won't find anything on your own. Please hurry!"

"R-really? If you say so... Be careful, the Nightmares will be lying in wait up ahead! And I will be waiting for you nearby, in case you need any help. But, I beg you, please hurry, Heavenly Envoy! They could be killing Albris as we speak..."

"R-really? If you say so... Be careful, the Nightmares will be lying in wait up ahead! And I will be waiting for you nearby, in case you need any help. But, I beg you, please hurry, Heavenly Envoy! They could be killing Albris as we speak..."

"R-really? If you say so... Be careful, the Nightmares will be lying in wait up ahead! And I will be waiting for you nearby, in case you need any help. But, I beg you, please hurry, Heavenly Envoy! They could be killing Albris as we speak..."

languages.text: “真——真的吗？既然你这么说……那请务必当心，那些梦魇会在前方埋伏！我会在这附近等你，以防你需要帮助。不过，求求你了，请快点，来自天国的使者！就在我们说话的这会儿，他们可能正在残害阿布里斯……”
languages.original_text: "R-really? If you say so... Be careful, the Nightmares will be lying in wait up ahead! And I will be waiting for you nearby, in case you need any help. But, I beg you, please hurry, Heavenly Envoy! They could be killing Albris as we speak..."

traits.locale_text: “真——真的吗？既然你这么说……那请务必当心，那些梦魇会在前方埋伏！我会在这附近等你，以防你需要帮助。不过，求求你了，请快点，来自天国的使者！就在我们说话的这会儿，他们可能正在残害阿布里斯……”

languages.text: «De... ¿de verdad? Si usted lo dice... ¡Tenga cuidado, las pesadillas esperarán más adelante! Yo estaré cerca, por si necesita ayuda. ¡Pero le ruego que se dé prisa, enviado del cielo! Podrían estar matando a Albris en este mismo instante...».
languages.original_text: "R-really? If you say so... Be careful, the Nightmares will be lying in wait up ahead! And I will be waiting for you nearby, in case you need any help. But, I beg you, please hurry, Heavenly Envoy! They could be killing Albris as we speak..."

traits.locale_text: «De... ¿de verdad? Si usted lo dice... ¡Tenga cuidado, las pesadillas esperarán más adelante! Yo estaré cerca, por si necesita ayuda. ¡Pero le ruego que se dé prisa, enviado del cielo! Podrían estar matando a Albris en este mismo instante...».

languages.text: 「ほ、本当ですか？あなたがそう言うなら…お気をつけて、悪夢がこの先で待ち構えています！助けが必要なときのために、近くで待機しています。でもお願いですから急いでください、天の使節様！こう話している間にも、アルブリスは殺されているかもしれません…」
languages.original_text: "R-really? If you say so... Be careful, the Nightmares will be lying in wait up ahead! And I will be waiting for you nearby, in case you need any help. But, I beg you, please hurry, Heavenly Envoy! They could be killing Albris as we speak..."

traits.locale_text: 「ほ、本当ですか？あなたがそう言うなら…お気をつけて、悪夢がこの先で待ち構えています！助けが必要なときのために、近くで待機しています。でもお願いですから急いでください、天の使節様！こう話している間にも、アルブリスは殺されているかもしれません…」

languages.text: "W-wirklich? Wenn Ihr das sagt ... Aber seid vorsichtig, die Albträume werden Euch auf dem Weg auflauern! Und ich werde in der Nähe auf Euch warten, falls Ihr Hilfe benötigt. Aber ich flehe Euch an, bitte beeilt Euch, {mf|himmlischer Gesandter|himmlische Gesandte}! Sie könnten Albris in diesem Moment bereits töten ..."
languages.original_text: "R-really? If you say so... Be careful, the Nightmares will be lying in wait up ahead! And I will be waiting for you nearby, in case you need any help. But, I beg you, please hurry, Heavenly Envoy! They could be killing Albris as we speak..."

traits.locale_text: "W-wirklich? Wenn Ihr das sagt ... Aber seid vorsichtig, die Albträume werden Euch auf dem Weg auflauern! Und ich werde in der Nähe auf Euch warten, falls Ihr Hilfe benötigt. Aber ich flehe Euch an, bitte beeilt Euch, {mf|himmlischer Gesandter|himmlische Gesandte}! Sie könnten Albris in diesem Moment bereits töten ..."

languages.text: « V-vraiment ? À vous de voir, mais... Méfiez-vous, les cauchemars tapis dans l'ombre ne vous feront pas de cadeau ! De mon côté, je vous attendrai dans les parages, au cas où vous auriez besoin d'aide. Mais je vous en supplie, faites vite, émissaire céleste ! Si ça se trouve, ils sont en train de faire un sort à Albris en ce moment même... »
languages.original_text: "R-really? If you say so... Be careful, the Nightmares will be lying in wait up ahead! And I will be waiting for you nearby, in case you need any help. But, I beg you, please hurry, Heavenly Envoy! They could be killing Albris as we speak..."

traits.locale_text: « V-vraiment ? À vous de voir, mais... Méfiez-vous, les cauchemars tapis dans l'ombre ne vous feront pas de cadeau ! De mon côté, je vous attendrai dans les parages, au cas où vous auriez besoin d'aide. Mais je vous en supplie, faites vite, émissaire céleste ! Si ça se trouve, ils sont en train de faire un sort à Albris en ce moment même... »

languages.text: "Gerçekten mi? Öyle diyorsanız... Dikkatli olun, Kâbuslar sizi bekliyor olacak! Yardım gerekirse diye yakında bekliyor olacağım. Yalvarırım acele et ey Kutsal Elçi! Biz burada konuşurken Albris'i öldürüyor olabilirler..."
languages.original_text: "R-really? If you say so... Be careful, the Nightmares will be lying in wait up ahead! And I will be waiting for you nearby, in case you need any help. But, I beg you, please hurry, Heavenly Envoy! They could be killing Albris as we speak..."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten mi? Öyle diyorsanız... Dikkatli olun, ileride Kâbuslar bekliyor olacak! Yardıma ihtiyacın olursa diye yakında seni bekliyor olacağım. Yalvarırım acele et Kutsal Elçi! Biz burada konuşurken Albris'i öldürüyor olabilirler..."
